LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Attach_Callout_Text: When enabled, callout text hovers above the callers head instead of flying out.
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Show_Wounds_Descrip: When enabled, text alerts appear over a pawn when a part is wounded.
LanguageData.CM_Callouts_Settings_Base_Callout_Chance: Base chance that a callout will be occur on a related event.
